commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Phew. We walked pretty far.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Well, we did a big round of sightseeing after getting off the rickshaw.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sounds like it's time for a break. All that walking made me hungry. I say we find somewhere to grab a snack.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hey, look! There's an ice cream place over there. Let's check it out!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: A sweet treat, huh? Just what the doctor ordered.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Gobble* Mmm! It's so cold and yummy.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Mm-hmm, it sure is! Maybe I'll have one more.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Normally I'd say you'd upset your stomach, but I could kinda go for another one myself.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We should pick different flavors next! Hee hee. What should I go with this time?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: There are so many, it's hard to decide.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: How about we share with each other for the second round? I wanna try the sweet red bean flavor!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: That sounds delicious! I'm going with the maple syrup flavor.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'm having banana! Excuse me, I'll take another ice cream, please!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Gobble* Kanan, your grape ice cream's so yummy!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: So is your banana!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Where to next?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm. Kanan, Mari, is there anywhere else you two want to go? Anything you want to do?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let me think. Oh, wasn't there a famous temple around here? I'd like to see it!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: A temple? Got it!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I saw a building that looked like a temple while we were riding the rickshaw. I think it was that way.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Careful, Rin! Don't just run off----

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Mya!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Rin!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yikes. Are you okay? That was a serious face plant. You're not hurt, are you?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oof. No, I'm okay. Oh, but...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: But what? Uh-oh. The ice cream's all over your clothes.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, no! We have to get that out right away or it'll stain. Is there a restroom around here? Oh, but then you'd end up all wet.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Umm, maybe we should head over to my house?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Your house?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yes. I have some of Rin's clothes there right now.
